titles.title: Lewis and Clark National and State Historical Parks Partnership Act of 2010
To match the boundaries of Lewis and Clark National Historic Park and Cape Disappointment and Fort Columbia State Parks in the State of Washington, and for other purposes.
Lewis and Clark National and State Historical Parks Partnership Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Lewis and Clark National and State Historical Parks Partnership Act of 2010 - Amends the Lewis and Clark National Historical Park Designation Act to add lands along the lower Columbia River in the state of Washington associated with the arrival of the Lewis and Clark Expedition at the Pacific Ocean in 1805 and identified as Fort Columbia to the Lewis and Clark National Historical Park.
